_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three knowledges [an10.102:1.10]: Understanding how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds
Realization of the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
The many kinds of past lives [an10.102:1: Many eons of the world contracting
Many eons of the world expanding
Many eons of the world contracting and expanding
